def: A service agreement specification identifying an organism for whom a healthcare service delivery aims at providing a desired effect to its health status.
A facility that bears a healthcare function - WiP.
A role that inheres in an organisation and is realized by providing some healthcare service delivery.
An organisation that bears a healthcare organisation role.
A health provider who is a member of a healthcare organisation.
A health procedure that is part of a healthcare service delivery and that is performed by a healthcare worker while realizing its health care worker role.
A service delivery under the responsibility of a healthcare organisation. It stems from an agreement between a requesting agent and a healthcare organization.

A healthcare organisation service delivery that aims at providing a desired effect on the health status of a specified organism. It is usually composed of health procedures and possibly associated ancillary processes.
A service delivery that aims to support health services without directly providing a desired effect on the health status of individuals or communities.
A service delivery from an organization that aims to provide for the activities of daily living of individuals or communities.
A healthcare service that aims at providing a desired effect on the health status of a community.
A temporally-connected healthcare organization clinical visit that aims to improve, maintain or restore the health of some participating organism.
A healthcare encounter during which the recipient is located in a healthcare facility at some time.
An identifier that denotes a public provincial health insurance record.
An identifier that denotes a building administered by a healthcare organization for the purpose of providing healthcare to a patient or patient population.
An identifier that denotes a healthcare organization.

A healthcare organisation clinical visit where the patient physically attends to a healthcare facility, but where there is no expectation of providing support for activities of daily living (such as eating and bathing) nor accommodation for the patient.
A healthcare organisation clinical visit where there is expectation of providing support for activities of daily living (such as eating and bathing) and accommodation for the patient.
An inpatient visit that does not extend overnight.
A day inpatient visit which includes a surgical procedure.
An inpatient visit located in a hospital facility requested by a physician, that may extends overnight.

A healthcare organisation clinical visit where there is expectation of providing unplanned, timely, urgent care, including handling life-threatening conditions.
It is not necessarily an immediate inpatient subsequent visit.

An emergency department visit and an inpatient visit, where there is usually limited accommodation and where the goal is to stabilise a life-threatening condition or decide whether the clinical situation requires a hospitalisation visit.
An emergency department visit and an outpatient visit.
An outpatient visit where there is expectation of providing unplanned, timely care, but excluding handling life-threatening conditions.
An outpatient visit which includes a surgical procedure.
An outpatient visit which includes a diagnostic procedure.
An immediate subsequent visit healthcare organisation visit for a given patient that was participating in another healthcare organisation visit for the same organisation just prior to this visit.

value: prior visit category to an inpatient visit
def: An information content entity describing the type of visit that occured prior to an immediate inpatient subsequent visit.
A healthcare organisation service delivery where the main entity of interest is a still born.
A healthcare organization clinical visit during which a birth statement was produced regarding the birth of the main patient visit beneficiary.

value: inpatient visit from an external location
def: an inpatient visit that is not immedately following another healthcare organisation clinical visit in the same organisation, and is not a healthcare birth visit
An emergency department visit for a given patient that was participating in another healthcare organisation visit involving paramedics just prior to this visit.
A healthcare organization service delivery where the main entity of interest is a human cadaver that was not delivered just prior to this service.
A healthcare organization clinical visit during which a death statement was produced regarding the death of the main patient visit beneficiary.
A directive information entity that aims at directing what health procedures or healthcare organization services are recommended after this visit.
A visit discharge specification that aims at directing to which healthcare organisation the patient should be transferred after the end of the current visit.
An information content entity that is part of a visit transfer specification and is about the type of healthcare organization specified.
A visit discharge specification for a given clinical visit that has no visit transfer specification.
A healthcare organization clinical visit ended at the initiative of the patient without physician approval.

value: visit ended by the patient without notification
def: A visit ended by the patient without notifying the healthcare organization.
An emergency department visit with a triage encounter but no further encounter.

value: emergency department visit with partial treatment
def: An emergency department visit and a visit ended by the patient and some treatment healthcare procedure was provided.
An identifier that denotes a diagnosis related group.

value: healthcare organization service delivery beginning statement
def: A process beginning statement that temporally qualifies the beginning of a healthcare organisation service delivery.

value: healthcare organization service delivery ending statement
def: A process ending statement that temporally qualifies the ending of a healthcare organisation service delivery.
An information content entity that contains the information required to manage the insurance coverage of an insured individual.

value: primary health insurance beneficiary human role
def: A role that is borne by an human that is the primary beneficiary of a health insurance plan and so is responsible for its associated contract.
A human that has a role of primary health insurance benificiary role

value: public provincial health insurance primary residence statement
provincial health insurance primary residence statement beginning

def: A healthcare organization clinical visit for a given patient that was participating in another healthcare organisation clinical visit just prior to this visit.

value: immediate subsequent visit in same organization
def: An immediate subsequent visit where both visits are under the responsability of the same healthcare organisation.
An hospitalization for a given patient that was participating in another healthcare organisation visit involving paramedics just prior to this visit.
A healthcare organization clinical visit involving an ambulance and paramedics as healthcare provider.
An hospitalization for a given patient that was participating in an ambulance initiated emergency departement visit.
A clinical visit unit type specification mandating an hospitalization admission to an intensive care unit.
A service agreement specification for a clinical visit admission.
A clinical visit agreement specification mandating the urgency level of the clinical visit.
A clinical visit urgency level specification mandating the urgency level of the hospitalization admission.
A clinical visit agreement specification mandating the type of unit required for a clinical visit.
A clinical visit agreement specification mandating the admitting physician.
A healthcare organization with a mandate to manage and coordinate healthcare procedures deliveries under the responsability of its members

value: living environment type prior to clinical visit statement
def: A primary residence statement that states the type of living environment of a patient immediately prior to a clinical visit.
An eukaryote that is the bearer of a patient role.
A role born by an organism which is the primary recipient in a healthcare organization clinical visit.
A patient that is a Homo sapiens.
A healthcare organization identifier that denotes a physician service.
An hospitalization for a given patient that starts with a stay in an intensive care unit.
An identifier that denotes a healthcare organization service delivery.

value: healthcare organization service delivery beginning temporal information
def: A temporal information that is a component of a healthcare organization service delivery beginning statement that states that the temporal region denoted by this temporal information overlaps with the temporal region occupied by the beginning of healthcare organization service delivery.

value: healthcare organization service delivery ending temporal information
def: A temporal information that is a component of a healthcare organization service delivery ending statement that states that the temporal region denoted by this temporal information overlaps with the temporal region occupied by the ending of healthcare organization service delivery.
A canadian postal code that denotes a geographical region where a canadian healthcare facility is located.
A canadian postal code that denotes a geographical region where postal payloads are to be delivered for a canadian healthcare organization.

value: canadian healthcare facility forward sorting area code
def: A canadian forward sorting area code that denotes a geographical region where a canadian healthcare facility is located.

value: canadian healthcare organization forward sorting area code
def: A canadian forward sorting area code that denotes a geographical region where postal payloads are to be delivered for a canadian healthcare organization.

value: healthcare organization clinical visit pathological condition impact statement
def: A pragmatically accepted statement that states the impact of a pathological condition on a clinical visit.
A healthcare procedure where the responsible healthcare worker comes to the conclusion that a clinical visit can end.

value: pathological condition impact type on clinical visit
def: An information content entity that describes the type of impact of a pathological condition on a clinical visit.
An identifier that denotes a healthcare provider.
A postal address that enables an agent to locate a facility.
An information content entity that aims at representing the various forms of care provided within the healthcare organization clinical visit as approximated by a case-mix group definition.

value: human age at beginning of the healthcare organization service delivery
def: A human age at a specified temporal region where the temporal region is denoted by a healthcare organization service delivery beginning temporal information, and expressed according to ISO8601 standard.

value: human age at the beginning of the healthcare organization service delivery statement
def: A human age at a specified temporal region statement that includes an human identifier, a healthcare organization service delivery identifier, and the human age at beginning of the healthcare organization service delivery of the human denoted by the human identifier, for the healthcare organization service delivery identified by the healthcare organization service delivery identifier.
